description: Detects usage of wmic to start or stop a service
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Service Started/Stopped Via Wmic.EXE
query: (((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"wmic.exe") OR (process.executable.text:"*\\WMIC.exe")) AND (process.command_line.text:"*\ service\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ call\ *" AND process.command_line.text:("*stopservice*" OR "*startservice*")))
